configurations.name: Python: -m verl.trainer.main config=examples/config.yaml data.train_files=JustinLeeCEO/MSCOCO2014@train data.val_files=JustinLeeCEO/MSCOCO2014@test worker.actor.model.model_path=/share/liyilin-nfs/models/Qwen2.5-VL-3B-Instruct worker.rollout.tensor_parallel_size=1 trainer.experiment_name=qwen2_5_vl_3b_geo_grpo trainer.n_gpus_per_node=8 trainer.save_debug_path=./debug worker.reward.reward_function=./examples/reward_function/coco_cider.py:compute_score
